text:
At the end of the training I realized that the EMM alarm was sounding, I tried to reset the error from IOS but it didn't work. 
I checked the displays of the control heads inside the cabinet and found the far-right DRIVER in fault (0). 
Disconnected and reconnected the connector with the purple and black wires on the right side of the DRIVER to reset the error and restored the motion system before the next session.
author: Fabrizio
title: A169 EMM Drive fault 0
